channel.title: emscripten on Nick Desaulniers
channel.description: Recent content in emscripten on Nick Desaulniers

item.title: Writing My First Technical Book Chapter
item.description: It’s a feeling of immense satisfaction when we complete a major achievement. Being able to say “it’s done” is such a great stress relief. Recently, I completed work on my first publication, a chapter about Emscripten for the upcoming book WebGL Insights to be published by CRC Press in time for SIGGRAPH 2015. One of the life goals I’ve had for a while is writing a book. A romantic idea it seems to have your ideas transcribed to a medium that will outlast your bones.
